channel.title: Logging In
channel.description:
Hey, I am posting because I need a little help :P, My server is online, Working.. One person connected today because my rsps is new and I have noticed I cannot log onto my server with them on No-ip.. I was wondering how because I though if i changed to localhost and then compiled it wouldn't all the other player's on my server get dc'ed and then they cannot play but then only I can play.
I am abit confused on how, Leave comment to help :)

item.title: Logging In
item.dc:creator: @i_am_infamy i am infamy
item.description:
@i_am_infamy wrote:

No you can make your client local host and you can connect but try restarting your source it might fix the problem

Read full topic
